reference.title: Monday.com Glossary
reference.shortdesc: These are some terms you may need to know to operate Monday.com

row.entry: Board - A board is where you can manage things within Monday.com. These things could be a group project, a task board, a roadmap, sales pipeline, or a budget
Main Board - Board that is visable to anyone who is a teammember on the account. Anything created on this board will be accessible to your team.
Shared Board- Board that is viewable to people outside of your team. You can adjust settings to allow the board to be viewed only and not edited.
Private Board - A board that is only accesiable to those who are invited to edit or view the board.
Board Owner- The person who created the board or a subscriber that has been granted admin privlages.
Automations - Increase producivity by automatically completing actions within Monday.com.
Integrations- Connecting Monday.com to outside software for increased productivity and better communication.
Three dots Menu-. Main menu located in the top right corner of the board page.
